statements: UPDATE educational_resources SET resource_name = 'New Resource Name' WHERE resource_id = 1;
UPDATE educational_resources SET resource_url = 'https://example.com' WHERE created_date > '2022-01-01';
UPDATE educational_resources SET resource_name = 'Updated Resource 1', created_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE resource_id = 1;
UPDATE educational_resources SET resource_url = 'http://example.com/resource2', created_date = '2022-02-15', resource_type = 'Book' WHERE resource_id = 2;
UPDATE videos SET title = 'Updated Title', duration = 120 WHERE video_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE quizzes SET total_questions = 15, passing_score = 70 WHERE quiz_id = '789abcde-f012-3def-4567-89abcdef0123';

UPDATE videos SET video_title = 'New Title', instructor_id = 2 WHERE video_id = 1;

UPDATE quizzes SET quiz_description='Updated description', quiz_difficulty='medium' WHERE quiz_id=3;

UPDATE users SET email='newemail@example.com', username='NewUsername' WHERE user_id=3;
UPDATE videos SET title = 'New Title', description = 'Updated Description' WHERE video_id = 1;
